messages.content: What is the purpose of the comfyui-faceless-node project?
The purpose of the comfyui-faceless-node project is to provide a next-generation face toolkit for ComfyUI.
What should users do if they encounter any problems while using comfyui-faceless-node?
If users encounter any problems while using comfyui-faceless-node, they should create an issue on the project's GitHub page.
How can users install the custom node for comfyui-faceless-node?

Users can install the custom node for comfyui-faceless-node by cloning the GitHub repository into the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes' directory and installing the required dependencies using 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.
What are the steps to set up the conda environment for comfyui-faceless-node?
The steps to set up the conda environment for comfyui-faceless-node include installing conda, creating a new conda environment named 'facefusion', activating the environment, and setting up CUDA.
Where can users find the models required for comfyui-faceless-node?
Users can find the models required for comfyui-faceless-node in the facefusion assets on GitHub.
How can users download the required models for comfyui-faceless-node?
Users can download the required models for comfyui-faceless-node by running the 'download_models.py' script in the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes/comfyui-faceless-node' directory.
What are some example workflows provided with comfyui-faceless-node?
Some example workflows provided with comfyui-faceless-node include image face swap and face restore, video face swap and face restore, and preview video frames.
Is the comfyui-faceless-node project based on any existing projects?
Yes, the comfyui-faceless-node project is based on the Facefusion project to implement a special version for ComfyUI.
